configuration.name: widget_08441068873157465
configuration.stem: Arrange the sequence of events into the correct order to show how a computer processes information.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the cause and effect for each event.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Someone taps a button, the information travels to the CPU, the CPU processes the data, the CPU sends the signal to the screen, and then the letter appears on the screen.

options.ddoText: The CPU sends a signal to the screen.
Someone taps the “A” key on a keyboard.
The letter “A” appears on the screen.
Information travels from the keyboard to the processing system.
The central processing unit (CPU) processes data.
